sense.def:
To adapt to a new situation
ali
to adapt oneself to a new situation
pomeni spremeniti se zaradi novih okoliščin.

seg.quote: He cannot adapt himself to being free.

sense.def:
To adapt something
pomeni tisto spremeniti, da bi bilo primerno novi namembnosti ali okoliščinam.

seg.quote: Reformers attempted to adapt traditional religion.

sense.def:
To adapt a book or play
pomeni spremeniti knjigo ali igro tako, da po njej lahko posnamejo film ali televizijsko oddajo.

seg.quote: Mortimer is adapting the novel for television.
